poem:
### Ceasefire

The air hums with unspoken words;  
optimism, a fragile breath amid dust.  
Yet silence clenches tightly around  
the fallen, voices unheard in the earth.  
Life's precarious dance,  
swaying on promises writ in shadows,  
while power whispers of peace,  
cloaked in the wail of mourning mothers.
